definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
Gestalt psychology (concerned with treating a subject as a coherent whole)

pinyin: ren4 zhi1 shen2 jing1 xin1 li3 xue2

sentences.english: This is the website for Department of Psychology, Memorial University of Newfoundland .
sentences.chinese: 這是紐芬蘭紀念大學心理學系的網站。

sentences.english: Paralanguage , including body language, has been extensively studied in social psychology.
sentences.chinese: 包括身體語言，已被廣泛地研究社會心理學。

sentences.english: The theory of constructionism contributes to the psychology teaching.
sentences.chinese: 建構主義理論對於心理學教學改革有着重要的啓示。

sentences.english: Constructivism is a revolution of contemporary educational psychology.
sentences.chinese: 建構主義是當代教育心理學的一場革命。

sentences.english: Well,in the context of a psychology course, it's anything but trivial that change is possible.
sentences.chinese: 在心理學上，改變是有可能的，這點十分重要。

sentences.english: But essentially research that falls under or within the field of positive psychology.
sentences.chinese: 但本質上屬於積極心理學範疇。

sentences.english: Psychologists could also identify the key ages that best allow for the memorization of classical texts.
sentences.chinese: 心理學家也可以幫助確定最適於記憶經典文本的年齡。

sentences.english: Social psychologists always are interested in inter-group behavior researches.
sentences.chinese: 羣際行爲研究一直是社會心理學家的興趣所在。

sentences.english: I take world history as my major.
sentences.chinese: 我以教育心理學爲主修專業。

sentences.english: Psychologists and psychiatrists say that children should be handled with care.
sentences.chinese: 心理學家和精神病專家說孩子需要小心呵護。

sentences.english: One day a college professor of Psychology1 was greeting his new college class.
sentences.chinese: 一天，一位大學心理學教授向他的新生們問候。

sentences.english: One of the lingering challenges in cognitive psychology is the evolution of language.
sentences.chinese: 認知心理學久而未決的挑戰之一便是語言的進化。

sentences.english: The problem was humanistic psychology is said lacked the rigorous methodology.
sentences.chinese: 人本主義心理學缺少嚴謹的方法論。

sentences.english: This is what psychologists dream about at night.
sentences.chinese: 心理學家做夢也會夢到這些。

sentences.english: Nowadays, psychometrics has already been a hot issue in psychological research.
sentences.chinese: 心理測量學目前已成爲心理學研究中的一個熱門課題。

sentences.english: I'm also completing master's-level studies in cognitive psychology.
sentences.chinese: 我正在完成心理學的碩士學位。

specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
